303125.<pc>とリナーシェの到着から\nしばらく遅れて セーリアと 大量の荷物を抱えた:
Some time after <pc> and Linashe's
arrival, Celia and Prince Odis arrived in Lane
Village, carrying heavy luggage.

303126.「それでは やはり\n このレーンの村は リナーシェ様の……。:
So, then it's true that this village is
Linashe's...

303127.「ええ。かつての コルレーン王国の領地です。\n あれから ６００年も経つのに\:
Yes. This is the former territory of Corlane. It's been 600 years since then, and my homeland's waters are still as beautiful as
ever...

303128.「この場所で ピクニックだなんて\n とても すてき。\n ありがとう セーリア:
It was such a good idea to have a picnic here.
Thank you both for coming.

303129.「セーリアが よく 話していたんです。\n リナーシェ様に 現代の\n ヴェリナ:
Celia often talked about wanting you to try
a modern Verinard meal, Linashe.

303130.「はい。私たちが 毎日\n おいしい ご飯を食べられるのは\n リナーシェ様の:
Of course. It's thanks to her that we get to
eat such delicious food every day.

303131.「現代のお食事は すごいのですよ。\n 私が生まれた ３００年前には\n なかっ:
Our modern dishes are amazing. There are
so many that just did not exist when I was
born 300 years ago.

303132.「まず サンドイッチは いかがですか？\n 手でつまめるし 具も種類豊富だし\n:
Why not try a sandwich first? You can eat it with your hands, has a wide variety of fillings, and most importantly, tastes best
when eaten outside.

303133.「こちらの お魚のパイも 絶品ですよ。\n サクサクの生地と 下味の効いた お魚:
The fish pie is also an excellent choice. The
crispy crust and the seasoned fish blend
together perfectly.

303134.「バーベキューは串を持って そのまま\n お肉に かぶりつくのが おすすめです！:
For barbecue, I recommend that you hold the
skewer and bite directly into the meat!

303135.「まあ お肉 大好きです<heart>\n わたくしの時代では あまり\n 食べ:
Well, I do love meat...<heart> Although,
we didn't eat much of it during my time.

303136.「一般的に ウェディは 魚を好みますからね。\n ４００年前の 大陸間鉄道 開通:
Weddies generally prefer to eat fish. Our diet has changed considerably since the intercontinental railroad's opening 400 years
ago.

303137.「私は お肉も お魚も 大好きですっ！: I love meat and fish so much!

303138.「リナーシェ様。\n 後学のために あなたが 王だった時代の話を\n 聞かせては:
Miss Linashe, for the sake of your future
students, would you be so kind as to tell
us about when you were a ruler?

303139.「ええ よろこんで。: Of course, it would be my pleasure.

303140.「わたくしにも あなたたちの話を\n 聞かせてくれる？\n もちろん お食事を:
And would you two like to share your stories
with me as well? While we're eating, of
course.

303141.「ふたりとも 今日は 本当にありがとう。\n とても 楽しい時間を 過ごせました:
Thank you both for everything today. I had
such an enjoyable time.

303142.「オーディス王子。３００年の掟を破り\n 王となるのは あなたが 想像するよりも:
Prince Odis...breaking a 300 year tradition
and becoming king will be a much more
challenging path than you may think...

303143.「けれど あなたの つねに上を目指す熱意と\n 教えを乞える素直さは すばらしい:
But your enthusiasm to always improve yourself and your willingness to learn from others are great traits to have. Please do your best to
become a kind king.

303144.「リナーシェ様……。\n はい。僕は かならず……王になります！\n なってみせ:
Miss Linashe... Yes! I promise I will become
king! I swear it!

303145.「セーリア。\n オーディス王子の 家族として\n 王子を となりで支えてあげて:
As Odis' family, you should stay by his
side and support him, right?

303147.「ふふふっ……もう。\n あなたたちは 本当に……！: Hehehehe... Well. You two really are...!

303148.「あの ふたり……なんと\n もどかしくて かわいらしいのでしょう！\n 応援し:
Those two...I just can't stand how cute they
are together! It makes you just want to
cheer them on, doesn't it?

303149.「<pc>さまは どなたか\n 好きな方が いらっしゃいますか？\n<selec:
Is there anyone that you like,
<pc>?
<select_nc>
There is.
There isn't.
I like you, Linashe.
<select_end>
<case 1>
<break>
<case 2>
<break>
<case 3>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

303150.「まあ……まあ まあ まあ！\n それはすてき！ あなたと その方の幸せを\n:
Wow...my, my! How lovely! I sincerely wish
you and that person all the happiness in
the world!

303151.「恋愛だけが 人生では ありませんものね。\n 申し訳ありません。ウェディの性か:
I suppose life isn't just about romance, after all. My apologiesーI tend to get carried away with love stories due to my nature as a
Weddie...

303152.「まあ うれしい。\n わたくしも <pc>さまが 大好きです<heart>:
My, I'm happy to hear that!
I love you too, <pc>. <heart>

303154.「<pc>さま。じつは わたくし ひとりで\n ヴェリナード城に行く 自信がなか:
To be honest, I was not very confident about
going to Verinard Castle all by myself. I
just...have too many painful memories there.

303155.「だから あなたを 頼りました。: That's why I needed to rely on you.

303156.「<pc>さま。わたくしは……\n 英雄に選ばれて よかった。\n 今は 本当に:
<pc>, I... I'm glad that I was
chosen to be a champion. I truly believe
that now.

303157.「ああ それにしても 海が綺麗です。\n ずっと 見ていたいけれど\n そういう:
Oh, the sea is so beautiful. I wish I could
just stare at it forever, but that's not
possible, is it?

303158.「あの……<pc>さま。\n もう少し ここにいて いいですか？\n もう少しだ:
Um, <pc>... Can I stay here just a
little bit longer? Just a little more, so I
can...

303159.それから リナーシェは\n何も言わず 海を ながめていた……。:
Linashe stared out into the sea, not uttering
a single word...

303160.「……ありがとうございました\n <pc>さま。\n そろそろ 天星郷に 戻りま:
Thank you, <pc>. I think it's about
time we headed back to the Firmament.
